title: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: this haaram showcases brilliant-cut diamonds and a vibrant oval-cut Emerald (7.61 carats). The diamonds are meticulously set with close attention to detail
the haaram is adorned with a Ruby(10.50 carats).
features: This stunning diamond Haaram features a delicate, cascading design that culminates in a striking oval Emerald pendant. The intricate diamond setting surrounding the Emerald showcases exceptional craftsmanship. The cascading design is reminiscent of traditional South Indian bridal necklaces, while the clean lines offer a modern touch.
colors: The color palette is dominated by the brilliance of the white diamonds
complemented by the rich green of the Emerald and the depth of the Ruby accents.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaah)
and milestone celebrations. A magnificent piece for a bride's muhurtham or a lavish reception. Also suitable for high-end parties and cultural events.
description: This exquisite Diamond and Emerald Haaram is a statement piece that embodies both tradition and modern elegance. Its exceptional craftsmanship, high-quality gemstones, and timeless design make it a valuable heirloom to be cherished for generations. The unique combination of a cascading diamond design with a central Emerald pendant makes it a truly unforgettable piece.
